properties.areaDesc: Waters from San Mateo point to the Mexican Border Extending 30 to 60 nm out including San Clemente Island; Coastal Waters from San Mateo Point to the Mexican Border and out to 30 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 25 at 10:28AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
A shallow marine layer will continue to cause areas of dense fog
throughout the day in the coastal waters. Visibility will be less
than one NM at times. This will result in hazardous navigation for
mariners. Conditions may improve some this afternoon but lowering
visibility will once again spread over the area after sunset.
